feed.title: Proposal for Quantum-Resistant Address Migration Protocol (QRAMP) BIP

entry.title: Proposal for Quantum-Resistant Address Migration Protocol (QRAMP) BIP
entry.summary: Agustin Cruz's email raises significant concerns regarding a proposal that suggests making legacy funds unspendable after a certain block height as part of a migration to quantum-resistant addresses. Such a move, according to Cruz, could have serious financial repercussions for individuals holding legacy funds. This critique is shared within the context of the Bitcoin Development Mailing List, indicating its relevance to ongoing discussions about enhancing Bitcoin's security and adaptability in the face of quantum computing advancements.
